bayes_network.cpd

Class SplitBranch

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes_network.cpd.SplitBranch

  • public class SplitBranch
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores all instances for which a specific attribute matches a specific value.
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

        public java.lang.Boolean doesInstanceMakeSplit(data.instance.Instance instance)
        Tests whether an instance makes this split branch.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the instance's attribute's value matches this SplitBranch's value
